org.divxdede.text.formatter
Interface PatternFormatter.AttributeArgumentNameSpace

All Superinterfaces:
PatternFormatter.ArgumentNameSpace
All Known Implementing Classes:
PatternFormatter.CompositeArgumentNameSpace
Enclosing class:
PatternFormatter
public static interface PatternFormatter.AttributeArgumentNameSpace
extends PatternFormatter.ArgumentNameSpace

AttributeArgumentNameSpace is a namespace binding conversion's identifier to a particular property of the argument. This namespace get a method for retrieve the property value of an argument depending of the conversion's identifier.

Method Summary
